ComicInfo.Title: The Coming of Samson; In the Land of Nod; The Arrival of Stardust; Origin of the Golden Knight; Captured By Skomah; The U. S. A. Is Invaded!!; Into the Fourth Dimension; At the Bottom of the Sea
ComicInfo.Summary:
Stardust captures a conglomerate of criminals and suspends them in mid-air while forcing them to gaze on the skeletons of everyone they killed.
Space Smith and Dianna are captured by the mad Martian scientist Skomah and his Imp Men, but make good their escape.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 18:11:22. [Issue ID 574]
